reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Locking Gas Cap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Price is right
reviews.reviewText: All is good. I worked for my 03 Dodge ram truck no problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No problems with it yet
reviews.reviewText: This fit my '01 RAM (gasoline engine) just fine. The cap is not much different than the original, the keyed lock insert is metal, but the rest is of course plastic. It is almost identical to the original in shape too. The keying seems to work well so far (time will tell), as some of these are poorly made, and fall apart. I haven't had this one long enough to judge its durability, but, with gas prices skyrocketing, and theft on the rise, having this thing may help deter some loser from syphoning my precious fuel. Pretty soon, the cost of this cap will be less than a single gallon....so you decide if it's worth it or not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Instant Regret - Would not unlock
reviews.reviewText: I was having a evap code show on my truck, common for gas cap seal issues. I figured since it could be the gas cap causing an issue, I would "upgrade" and get a locking cap. Well, I tested the new cap as much as I could before installing, it seemed to lock and unlock without issue...until I installed it. The key became extremely difficult to insert and take out, then as soon as the key entered, there was no way to unlock the cap. Several people tried it with me, we researched further, YouTube videos, other reviews on this product. We found that we were not alone and we were now in trouble.The only way to get the cap off at this point, according to other reviewers and our YouTube videos, was to pry it off.If this happens to you, please find a straight head and do your best...be mindful that there are a few springs inside that can fall into your tank if you don't catch them in time. Good luck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works great fit my dodge perfect it seals right and easy to use the key hole is a little stiff at first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Broke after 5 months
reviews.reviewText: The cap only lasted five months. The entire cap is lightweight plastic, but the key and core are metal, and after a couple of months, the key began sticking when trying to turn it. At the five-month mark, the key and core just spun and pulled out of the lock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fit is exact this a replacement on my dakota slt for a broken key stuck in cap of my original gas cap cost was a factor in choosing this good price high quality does the job couldn't ask for more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Protect you and your property in every way
reviews.reviewText: I wish I didn’t need to buy a locking gas cap but if you have to this locking gas cap is it .In these difficult times when gas cost as much as it does . People have no regard for one another or the other persons property . It’s up to you to protect your property in every way ?
It is kinda flimsy and can get come apart if forced the wrong way. More for peace of mind than a real deterrent to someone that wants to pry it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my Ram 1500, was always a bit tricky to use but after a few months I pulled up at the pump to fill up, fuel needle was in the red so not many miles left in the tank, and it wouldn’t unlock, after struggling with it for a few minutes a queue was building up behind me, the top fell off leaving the base still attached to the truck f###!!!!!! My ring piece was now twitching like a rabbits nose.Finally managed to get what was left of the cap off and filled my tank, luckily I still had the original fuel cap in the truck so I refitted that.This fuel cap is junk, spend your money on something else.
Poor quality locking mechanism lasted one month. Delivered sept 22, broke oct 25 and had to drill it off at the gas station

I just bought this item a little over a month ago. Went to get gas and top part of cap broke off and the bottom part was stuck in my gas tank. I was hoping to return the item but unfortunately I’m past the 30 day return window. Wouldn’t buy this product again. Just want my money back.
The lock did not lock consistently, eastern made POS
